  • Reference

Suspicion of infection label

Source: R/label-si.R
label_si.Rd

The Sepsis-3 label is a combination of a suspected infection and an acute increase in SOFA score by ≥ 2 points.

si_data(
  source,
  abx_count_win = hours(24L),
  abx_min_count = 1L,
  positive_cultures = FALSE,
  dictionary = read_dictionary("concept-dict"),
  ...
)

si_windows(
  tbl,
  si_mode = c("and", "or"),
  abx_win = hours(24L),
  samp_win = hours(72L),
  si_lwr = hours(48L),
  si_upr = hours(24L)
)

si(source, ...)

Arguments

source

String valued name of data source
abx_count_win

Time span during which to apply the abx_min_count criterion
abx_min_count

Minimal number of antibiotic administrations
positive_cultures

Logical flag indicating whether to require cultures to be positive
dictionary

dictionary object to use for concept lookup
...

Passed to load_concepts()
tbl

ts_tbl object to use for label computations
si_mode

Switch between and/or modes
abx_win

Time-span within which sampling has to occur
samp_win

Time-span within which antibiotic administration has to occur
si_lwr, si_upr

Lower/upper extent of SI windows
